Package org.zssn.escaperoom

Class Key

java.lang.Object
org.zssn.escaperoom.Item
org.zssn.escaperoom.Key
public class Key extends Item
Key class is a subclass of Item. It is used to unlock doors in the game.

      public Key(String name, int id, String image, int currentRoom)
      Constructor for the Key
      Parameters:
      name - name of the key
      id - id of the key
      image - image of the key given as a name of the file in the src/main/resources folder
      currentRoom - current room of the key
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the room is not between 0 and 9
